problem_text_cn: 如图,光源P在横杆AB的正上方,AB在灯光下的影子为CD,AB∥CD,AB=2m,CD=6m,点P到CD的距离是2.7m,则AB与CD的距离为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the light source P is directly above the crossbar AB, the shadow of AB under the light is CD, AB ∥ CD, AB = N_0, CD = N_1, the distance from point P to CD is N_2, then the distance between AB and CD is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵AB∥CD,∴△PAB∽△PCD,
假设CD到AB距离为x,则\frac{2.7-x}{2.7}=\frac{AB}{CD},
又∵AB=2m,CD=6m,∴\frac{2.7-x}{2.7}=\frac{1}{3},∴x=1.8m．
故选:B．
